title: RADAR 10.5.003 Homeopathic Software Full Cracked v2
description:
This is a collection of files from the Internet, in order to install Radar Homeopathic Software v10.5.03 and Encyclopedia Homeopathica v2.2.1.

The procedure is a little tricky but both applications work fine under Windows 7 and Windows 8 32 & 64 bit !!

1. *** Disable Antivirus and Firewall !!! ***
2. Install the Radar 10.0.028 and EH 2.x using the files provided
3. Install the updates to Radar 10.5.03 and EH 2.2.1
4. Patch the executable files
5. Set compatibility to Windows 7 (for Win8 users) or Windows XP SP2 or SP3 (for Win7 users) and run as administrators everything (including AutoReg.exe)
6. Click Full Repertories under Radar 10 Config utility to bypass the permissions (administrator rights) error

BELIEVE ME, I HATE THESE GUYS THAT POST FAKE APPs!!

I passed 2 days searching the internet for a WORKING solution and this is it !!!
